name: cypress-sample
description: Sample cypress project that integrates with qTest Automation Host's Universal Agent

scripts.cy:run: npm run delete:reports && ./node_modules/.bin/cypress run --browser chrome --reporter junit --reporter-options='mochaFile=reports/junit-report-[hash].xml,toConsole=true'
scripts.cy:run:selected: npm run delete:reports && ./node_modules/.bin/cypress run --browser chrome --reporter junit --reporter-options='mochaFile=reports/junit-report-[hash].xml,toConsole=true' --spec='cypress/integration/examples/actions.spec.js' --env tests='["Actions .type() - type into a DOM element","abcxyz"]'

author: Huy Nguyen
